alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 3:15PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The southern Adirondacks, Mohawk Valley, and Schoharie Valley in eastern New York. * WHEN...From Friday evening through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed an inch per hour mid Saturday morning into the afternoon. Blowing and drifting snow could reduce visibility Saturday afternoon into Saturday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
